item.description: #Address Re-use in different cryptocurrencies Bitcoin originated a method of conducting transactions called Unspent Transaction Outputs or UTXO. This means whenever you want to spend funds from your Bitcoin wallet app, your app will send the remainder balance to a new public address generated for you by the wallet app. This makes UTXO-type cryptocurrencies require you to generate and physically give out a new public address every time you want to accept funds from someone.
